original: 佔據山頭，洗劫過往旅人或農民的山賊，手持劣等長槍作為武器，對騎兵有加成，以財物為目標，是只求在亂世中生存的投機份子。
text: Bandits who occupy the top of the mountain and ransack the passing travelers or farmers, armed with inferior spears as weapons, have a bonus to the cavalry, and target property. They are speculators who only seek to survive in troubled times.
